Module org.panteleyev.fx
Package org.panteleyev.fx

Class BoxFactory

java.lang.Object
org.panteleyev.fx.BoxFactory
public final class BoxFactory extends Object
This class provides methods to create instances of HBox and VBox. This API respects special node value FxUtils.SKIP.

      public static javafx.scene.layout.HBox hBox(double spacing, javafx.scene.Node... nodes)
      Creates new HBox.
      Parameters:
      spacing - the amount of horizontal space between each node
      nodes - the initial set of child nodes for this pane
      Returns:
      HBox instance
